content: Like any investment William Belk A decision to pursue trade mastery compounds like interest. In my experience taking this course pays much higher dividends the earlier it is prioritized. The 23 year old, recent grad that chases trade mastery has 50+ years to compound on that. Possibilities for future growth are very high. This person is likely to write and be thought of as a seasoned expert by their 50s, just by virtue of pure focus, intuition, and perspective.
